posts.post_content:
Looking for any of the following portraits.
Only interested in snow white fronts, 50/50 centered all the way around.
Couldn't care less about the back.

  * Smith SL
  * McIntyre
  * Chase
  * O'Neill
  * Downs


Please send scans and prices by PM or email to [url]trae@t206.org[/url].

Thanks :)

...O'Neil or Oberlin?  Oberlin is one of my all time favorite pinks!

(sorry for the hijack)

Thanks, Paul, O'Neill... or Downs for that matter are both nice pink cards - definitely interested in either of those as well.

Oberlin is nice too, but I'm only collecting portraits for now.
